name: @xata.io/codegen
description: Generates types based on a Xata.io database schema. Meant to be used with @xata.io/client

scripts.example-ts: npm run build && node dist/index.js -s example/xata/schema.json -o example/xata.ts && sed -i '' 's|@xata.io/client|../../client/src|' example/xata.ts
scripts.example-js: npm run build && node dist/index.js -s example/xata/schema.json -o example/xata.js && sed -i '' 's|@xata.io/client|../../client/src|' example/xata.js
